item.title: Elon Musk "Can't Wait" To Be Part Of Donald Trumps Cabinet
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has confirmed he wants to work with former President Donald Trump in auditing US agencies to identify programmes for cuts.

item.title: How much is AI hurting the planet? Big tech won't tell us.
item.description: All your AI questions? All that art? It wasn't free. The hidden cost: lots of new power-hungry, water-thirsty data centers.
